attributes.content: There is an old man in the audience.
This old man has not a speck of interest in competition knights. At the behest of his beloved grandchild, he has grudgingly purchased two tickets to the event so hyped up by the newspapers and media.
He frowns, he sighs, for he does not know why the crowd cheers for the public execution of the young Kuranta by the Sarkaz.
He does not think anything is wrong, for he too was once a knight, a campaign knight without a noble title. He merely scoffs at the competition, at the Sarkaz.
Yet, the battlefield suddenly flares with a blazing light. The old man remembers that the knight is the young lady of the Nearl family.
What a pity, he laments as he stares at the dazzling light. At the same time, the very few Kazimierz present in the audience simultaneously recall an old story.
The story takes place in a land beyond rivers, forests and lakes, in a great fortress formed of towers and walls.

Every day, as night falls, blazing torches form an unbroken line. The campaign knights’ armor gleams beneath the moonlight, the sharp edges of their silver lances point at the restless enemy prowling in the darkness.
The invaders are ruthless. The Leithaniens, capable of coloring the sky, black out the moon. The terrible armies of Ursus overwhelm the castle walls.
Cities are captured and brought into Ursus in humiliation. The lines fall back once and again, as 'Silverlance' becomes a mocking joke leveled at the knights by the warmongers.
They are pushed to the outskirts of the last city, the last line of defense——
——Where Kazimierz makes its last stand, a pegasus with golden hair appears.
On the dawn of that day, when the Ursus suffer their first defeat of the war, on the faraway horizon of Kazimierz, two suns rise.
Light.
The light does not dissipate. Rays of light diffuse into a haze, banishing the terror.
At this moment, even the sun itself nods, welcoming the returning knight.
...Maria.
Stand up, Maria.
......Margaret?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria.
You’ve grown up. You’ve really done well.
No... That’s not Maria’s Arts...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Mr. Czarny! We just received a message from——the Armorless Union! A beam of light crashed into the arena from a kilometer away northwest!
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: It was very, very fast! They couldn’t even get a glimpse of what it was!
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...Terrorist attack?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I-It doesn’t seem like a weapon. It’s a person, a Kuranta, but only the strongest knights are able to handle speed like that——
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Impossible... Light... Could it be...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Guh... Where’s the enemy? Too bright, can’t see...!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Mission, must be completed. No matter who——kill the target first!
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Knocked off my feet... barehanded...? Who?
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Foul Arts and tortured Sarkaz Infected. Is this what a 'knight' should be?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Gaa...
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Margaret...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Wait... Is it really you? I’m not hallucinating, am I...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It’s me.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: R... Really?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ......Margaret?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You’ve done well, Maria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: *Sob*... Margaret... What... What took you so long...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Wretch! Kill them both!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: No, don’t even think about it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Why... Why can’t I hit her...?
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: ...Her light is gathering and suppressing our Arts. Retreat. I will deal with her.
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: It’s her——She came in that light. It’s——that’s——that’s the Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What’s going on?! The exiled Radiant Knight returns at the climax of this fight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (Hey! Go get the spokesman! What the hell is going on?! What——Huh?)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Sh-She broke the rules! But that’s not important! To save her sister, the Radiant Knight did whatever it took to return to Kazimierz!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Exceptional courage! Extraordinary demeanor! Unrelenting in the face of the two knights from hell!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Let us cheer——for the Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: That’s... Margaret? That knight with the shield is the Radiant Knight...?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: W-Why did she come back to Kazimierz...?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I don’t even recognize her anymore...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...It’s her. What has she been through all these years...?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight, that spirited Margaret... She’s returned?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Huff...... Just be a dear and let us through.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Sorry. No can do.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: So we gotta put our lives on the line then, eh?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I’d really rather you didn’t.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I’ll say it again: there’s nothing you can do. I live by a rule, I don’t fight with anyone but my target.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: As long as you stay away from the arena, you get to live——Hm?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ——It’s getting bright?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hey! V, look over there!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: What...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: That light... that...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Old Man Nearl...?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: (This is a lot more intense than Maria’s Arts. Could it be...?)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (But... The two Lazurites... It can’t be...)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: It’s me.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Time to stop playing, little pegasus. Pack up and skedaddle.
...What?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight herself is in the mix. No point to guarding the door anymore, is there?
I think I get the gist of it... But you still failed, even with the both of you?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Don’t be so suspicious of your superiors, little pegasus. The board of directors only asked us to 'watch the Radiant Knight' after all, not fight her...
I was thinking that even if we did fight, I would have that dumb-faced idiot with me so it wouldn’t be any problem at all.

Turns out there was, uh, a tiny issue shall we say. First off, the Radiant Knight seems to have gotten just that little bit stronger... There are also some troublesome horns together with her, it’s really annoying.
Well... If it’s even giving you trouble, you’re wasting your time telling me about it.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh, I almost forgot. I wanted to tell you about it because the target is approaching your location right now——Hmm, might be too late, actually.
Well, try to avoid fighting at all costs. Good luck surviving, little Platinum.
Sorry? Wait...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What the hell are they doing...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Could it be Młynar? No, can’t be... He should still be in his office... Then...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Nnh...!
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (Wh-what? Just now, was that...a blue shadow?)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I know!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What’s happening? I’ve never felt like this before...
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...Don’t move. Breathe slowly and look around.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: (Feels like I’ve been made... And those two are looking jumpy...)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh, here.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: A white-horned Sarkaz holding a sword stops in front of them. She breathes softly, raising her eyes at them.
......Ugh, of course they’d be difficult to handle... They’re not even knights...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Let them pass. Their names aren’t on the list anyway.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Liz, can you still move?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Yes... It’s bright over there.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: It’s Nearl.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Let us go then?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...Really, what’s going on today...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: That Sarkaz just now... Does she know Margaret? What’s happening?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: It’s really Margaret! V! Margaret’s back!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...Don’t yell.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Then... What about us? Do we keep going?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Don’t stare at me like that... You get to live.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: They cancelled the mission. I don’t have a reason to stop you anymore.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You get to live.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You gonna leave, just like that? Halt!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: V! Don’t bother with them, let’s get to the arena!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Tch...damned Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Margaret Nearl... The Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Where’s the arena security?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: S-Security...? That was the Radiant Knight charging at full power, we’d probably have to raise the city’s barrier to stop her...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Radiant Knight...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Haha... Radiant Knight... With things as they are now, why did you even return? To look at the knights’ epitaph?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Mr. Czarny! We’ve received word from the General Chamber of Commerce... You...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Mr. Markowitz.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: No matter what happens next, even if I don’t return, you must not leave this room.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: O-Okay...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Yes, I’ve already prepared everything beforehand... Yes, Czarny, you have already done everything you could, so just wait for the curtain call.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: How amusing... Pfft, hahaha...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Sir...?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Ah, excuse me...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Mr. Czarny? Your phone...?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...I know, I know.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Please excuse me... for a moment.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...Knight techniques.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But drug overdose and signs of overreliance on Arts. Also...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Guh——
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: I will suppress her! Kill the target!
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: The mentally crippled Sarkaz warrior brandishes his weapon, Arts and the smell of a grave.
But the Radiant Knight does not move.
——Kill her!
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Hmm, the explosive energy has been dissipated——
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ——Die!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Guh....! You...still have strength?!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Maria, your wounds——
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret! You once said a knight raises her shield to protect others... right?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But, now, on this battlefield——
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ——There is no one that you need to protect!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I will become your shield, so——
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Move aside, I will blast them both to death!
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: ——I’ll do my best!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Guh... She abandoned her shield! But your Arts!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: ...This, impossible... That warhammer is her staff, she...
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Are you ready, Maria?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: To be a knight...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Is to be the noble light that illuminates the land!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight who charged onto the field has abandoned her shield after just a few short exchanges! Hold on! Wait!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Remember the two-handed warhammer craze that followed the Radiant Knight?! Watch her swing that hammer, her shield long forgotten! This is the old school Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: She’s out there, against all odds! The return of the legend! The National Council could drag her away right after this match. This could be our only chance to witness the glory of the Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This... these Arts, this glow...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Why are you allowed to give off that kind of light so impassively...? You arrogant little——Do you really think yourself the sun?! Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: How long has it been since we saw Margaret put her shield down?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Her light... It’s hot.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: She will be fine, right?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I’ve never seen her fail, after looking like that.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The girl is a lot like Nearl.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Yes, that’s her sister.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Hehe... What a cute little knight. I can see the resemblance.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...Arrows... ran out!
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Gaa——! Your Arts!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: He’s forming arrows using his Arts... I’ll block them!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Leave the rest to me.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Can’t penetrate——this damned light!
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: ...The audience is quiet.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Margaret doesn’t have an advantage. Those two Sarkaz are strong... and work well together.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: But I don’t feel like Margaret will lose... I don’t even think she is disadvantaged...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Her techniques are mesmerizing... Her demeanor is so calm, yet her light burns so brightly...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: It reminds me of Old Nearl, when he was young.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Un-unbelievable! Totally unbelievable!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The radiance from every swing of Margaret’s warhammer completely dispels her opponent’s Arts! Even the cracks the Radiant Knight steps on are filled with light!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What amazingly brilliant Arts! Combat techniques of this level!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is definitely befitting of a champion! The true strength of a knight——!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Haa... My wounds aren’t hurting as much anymore... Is this Margaret’s Arts too?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Caring about me even during a battle like this——)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Gaa——! My hammer...!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: No weapon, then, with my hands, I’ll tear you apart——!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Kill her!
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Margaret has a strange expression on her face. It’s...pity?
For these two Sarkaz? Because they are called knights? Or is it... because of their circumstances?
...Maria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Ah, I’m here!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I’ll leave the support to you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ——Yes!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Do it!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Repent.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: At this moment, the entire arena descends into silence.
No one has realized that the match has ended. There aren’t any knights boasting about their victory, nor are there the defiant howls of the losers.
The corrupted Sarkaz kneel on the ground——They have not fallen over, and the Radiant Knight does not strike.
She looks down upon the two Sarkaz, then takes a knee and extends her hand.
There is no reply from the Sarkaz.
You should not give up on your destiny.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: As if unwilling to bow to the two young girls, they remain silent, unable to stand.
The Radiant Knight turns.
Maria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Eh? What...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: We’ve won.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: This is unbelievable! Can you believe your eyes?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Because I sure can’t! The Radiant Knight who suddenly entered the fight! The Knights Association that let it happen! Oh my god, I, this——
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I’ve never seen a situation like this in all my years of commentating! Though I don’t know how the National Council will react, it doesn’t change the fact that they won!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (Mr. Mob.)
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: (...Oh, you’re here!)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I am deeply honored to announce to everyone!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (Mr. Spokesman, what should I do?)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (Acknowledge her.)
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: The winner is! The young and miraculous Maria! Aaaand, she who has returned from her long exile, the pegasus that everyone knows, the Radiant Knight! Margareeeeeeeeet Neaaaaaaaaarl!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (That’s right, Mr. Mob. I really do appreciate your ability to fan the fervor of the audience.)
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: (Hold the fort for a while, someone will come to handle this.)
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Cheer for her——!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Zofia?! Where are you going?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Marcin! Where are they——Ugh, that, that one?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Is it really Margaret... Why’d Margaret come back now?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: N-no matter what, she’s an exile. Why didn’t she tell us——
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Alright, both of you calm down. Młynar might have known about this... But for now, we need to leave.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: The reporters and the crowd are going to swarm this place. We have to find a way——to get the Radiant Knight home.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Radiant Knight! That’s the Radiant Knight from last season!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Make way, make way! Let me get a picture!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Everyone! Everybody! Please remain calm! No matter what happened, we have to make sure that the competition adheres to the proper procedures all the way up to the end!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (What should I do next?! You can’t contact the spokesman?! Idiot! Go look for him at the VIP seats——!)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Hold on! That, that’s the Whislash Knight! The Whislash Knight suddenly rushed towards the Radiant Knight from the crowd——
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Zof——
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Eh——A-Aunt Zofia?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You... Why are you back?!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ——D-did she just slap the Radiant Knight? Huh? Eh? This looks like it’ll be in the papers tomorrow——
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I’m sorry. But I’ve returned.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...That slap was for Maria.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I’ll spare you my own.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Thanks for sparing me... But, you used your right hand just now... When did that happen?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Now isn’t the time to talk about that. The National Council will definitely not allow an exile to return to Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: We have to leave before the reporters and the National Council show up.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: R-right now? But the competition results haven’t...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It doesn’t matter! She’s here and that’s way more important than the competition!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Nearl.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Careful, Liz!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...You don’t need to worry so much. Alright, hold my hand tight.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: These two Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Don’t worry, they’re my friends. Shining, can you do me a favor?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I... I fainted... These are healing Arts?
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Who... you?!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Sarkaz, you... you! It can’t be, you? Healed me?
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Your injuries are very serious, but they are not from this match. The scars of drug usage may never be removed. You should take better care of yourselves.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Go away——Don’t touch me! Guh...
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Wait... You...you are...
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: ——Nearl.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Yeah, I know.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Those two assassins from the Armorless Union are still watching us... Now is not the time to celebrate.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A-Armorless Union? You——
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Time to run? Nearl?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: ——No.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A victorious knight has no reason to scurry away like a coward. If they wish to stop us, just let them try.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Nearl, over there.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Ah... It’s Mr. Kowal and Mr. Vogelweide. Have they found something?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What do you think?! Of course they’re preparing a way for you to escape!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The three of us will help keep the crowds away from you, but the National Council will definitely be paying you a visit. You’ll have to deal with them yourself——
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ——Margaret!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yeah?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It’s really great... that you came back.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The usual place, don’t be late.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That’s... Nearl’s family?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: She’s come back home. We can all see her joy, no?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: So, let’s give her some space. She’s the Radiant Knight after all. No one in Kazimierz can touch her.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: We’ll regroup with Amiya later.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Margaret raises her head.
She used to hate this land with every fiber of her being.
...Maria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Ah, yes?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Let’s go home.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But this is her home.
...You’re here. What about your little follower?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...He’s the next one.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Ah... How cruel.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Just tell me the answer.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Well, aren’t you straightforward...? You already know the answer, why ask me?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Maybe you can live better.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: No... Maybe I will die on the way to my exile. Maybe you will be the one to do it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...Maybe. Don’t blame me, if I am.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: It won’t happen through the National Council. You’ll have to leave by tonight. Is there anything you need to take care of?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Szewczyk has a young son. He was present during the incident.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I wish to ask you...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...To make sure that he never has a chance to speak the truth.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny
